short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple app for calling the api, not many function there

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too many complex software in the market with the function of calling remote api, but this one is no more than calling the api, and get what u want directly.
